pic1_alt: Plot of the Oldest Verified People, a breakdown by gender & country. The x-axis is Birth Date, from 1860 through about 1920. The y-axis is Age, from 111 to about 123. The plot is faceted by gender (female and male), and the points are colored by country. The oldest person is identified as female, from probably France (although the color scale is hard to differentiate). Each plot has many over-plotted points.
pic2_alt: A table of the 20 Oldest Verified People. All 20 are female. The table lists the rank, name, gender, age, place of residence, and birth date. The oldest is Jeanne Calment of France, born on 1875-02-21, shown as having an age of 122. This was her age when she died, in 1997 (data not shown).
